sentences.en: A common denominator of many low - stress jobs is tangible results.
sentences.cn: 许多低压力的工作都有个共同点那就是其效果切实可见.

sentences.en: After cancellation, the factor is still present in the denominator.
sentences.cn: 相消后该因子仍存在于分母中.

sentences.en: As you say, the only common denominator is their internal implementation.
sentences.cn: 正如你所说, 唯一的共同点是它们的内部实现.

sentences.en: Hence developers only have access to the lowest common denominator set of features.
sentences.cn: 因此,开发者只能获得最低的共同标准的功能集.

sentences.en: I think the only common denominator of success is hard work.
sentences.cn: 我认为取得成功唯一的共同要素是勤奋。

sentences.en: In this exercise you have to convert a given number into a fraction by entering a numerator and denominator. Do not forget to reduce the result.
sentences.cn: 在此练习中您要将一个给定的数字转换成一个分数，输入转化结果的分子和分母。不要忘了将结果约分至最简分数。

sentences.en: In this exercise you have to convert a given number into a fraction by entering numerator and denominator. Do not forget to reduce the result!
sentences.cn: 在此练习中您要将一个给定的数字转换成一个分数，输入转化结果的分子和分母。不要忘了将结果约分至最简分数！

sentences.en: Matters of judgement reduced to the lowest common denominator acceptable to a majority of the voters.
sentences.cn: 需要裁决的事务被降低到大多数投票人所能接受的最低标准.

sentences.en: No, maybe some day, but it will be lowest common denominator.
sentences.cn: 现在不能, 将来某一天可能行, 但这种可能性将是最小的.

sentences.en: Only a single denominator do they share.
sentences.cn: 他们只有一种共同的特点.

sentences.en: Physicists have, of course , been searching for the commonon denominator between electrons and protons.
sentences.cn: 诚然,物理学家已在探索电子和质子的共同性质.

sentences.en: Tabloid newspapers pander to the lowest common denominator.
sentences.cn: 小报都竭力迎合大众口味。

sentences.en: The common denominator of economic calculation is money.
sentences.cn: 这个经济计算的共同标准就是货币.

sentences.en: The fractions selected for comParison must require pupils to consider both numerator and denominator.
sentences.cn: 所选的用于比较的分数必须要求学生同时考虑分子和分母.

sentences.en: The school syllabus seems aimed at the lowest common denominator.
sentences.cn: 学校的教学大纲似乎是针对接受能力最差的学生制定的。

sentences.en: The value of a fraction is inversely proportional to that of the denominator.
sentences.cn: 分数值与分母值成反比例.

sentences.en: You have to enter numerator and denominator.
sentences.cn: 您需要输入结果的分子和分母.

trans.tran_en: the number below the line in a  fraction
